directions: Cut each biscuit into 8 pieces; toss with pizza sauce and 1 cup of the cheese.
Spread in sprayed 13x9-inch (3-quart) glass baking dish. Top with pepperoni and remaining 1 cup cheese.
Bake at 375 degrees F 20 minutes or until golden brown and bubbly.
ingredients: 1 (16.3 ounce) can Pillsbury® Grands!® Homestyle refrigerated original biscuits
title: Grands!® Pepperoni Pizza Bake
